keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to absolute equality, investigating repealing the blood donation rules for gay men, questioning the position of 16-year-olds who can still serve in section 2(1) but are considered too young to vote.

issues.education: Unfair to place burdens on English and Welsh students. Free tuition fees here in Scotland, let's get it UK-wide!
issues.governance: Every Lib Dem vote is one to protect our civil liberties.

housing.content: The Lib Dems have proven that they are committed to absolute equality.

quotes.text: The Lib Dems have proven that they are committed to absolute equality.
quotes.source: Dil Davies, 3rd year English and Theatre
